attributes.action: Stop excessive rises in MP's pay, pensions.& expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We constantly hear from Government and MP’s that times are getting harder and we all need to tighten our belts and reduce our expectations..  However, at the same time MP’s are voting themselves above average pay and pension rises and claiming immorally high expenses.
They write the rules by which we must abide, via the control of Her Majesty’s Revenue & Customs, then formulate vastly different rules for themselves.
We, the electorate, feel that this imbalance must cease immediately.  Pay and pensions should be directly linked to inflation whilst the rules for expenses should be the same as for the general public.

rejection.details: There are a number of similar petitions already on the Number 10 site, including: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/hmgpay/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
